content.excerpt: Short week, but I packed in tonnes, too much to write about really: We kicked off the thing I mentioned last week (although I haven't doneâ€¦

One of our more obscure systems had a relatively complex outage this week, and I'm left wondering why one might use stored procedures inâ€¦
